WorkItem.Description:
Under certain circumstances the BackgroundWorker Component's ProgressChanged event and RunWorkerCompleted event will run on the wrong thread. 
 
Here is the information on this bug:
http://connect.microsoft.com/VisualStudio/feedback/details/116930/backgroundworker-components-progresschanged-and-runworkercompleted-event-run-on-wrong-thread
 
Please provide sample code that insures the BackgroundWorker is started on the UI thread.
 
This is a problem I have been trying to resolve for many months.
 
Thank you !
